org.deeplearning4j.models.embeddings

Interface WeightLookupTable<T extends SequenceElement>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GloveWeightLookupTable, InMemoryLookupTable, JointStorage

    public interface WeightLookupTable<T extends SequenceElement>
extends java.io.Serializable
    General weight lookup table
